intro: Myosotis tenuis, commonly known as slender forget-me-not, is a flowering plant native to New Zealand. It is a member of the Boraginaceae family and is characterized by its small, blue or violet flowers. The plant typically grows in damp, shaded environments such as forest floors and stream banks. It has slender, hairy stems and heart-shaped leaves. Myosotis tenuis is valued for its ornamental appeal and is sometimes cultivated in gardens.
